#summary Examples of bar charts.
#labels Phase-Documentation

This page gives several samples of bar charts.
====Sample 1====
{{{
<pbars size=300x150 title="Site Visitors" ymin=0 ymax=10000 legend>
,Europe,United States,Asia
Oct,5345,3110,1291
Nov,3452,3695,1047
Dec,7843,4712,1305
</pbars>
}}}

http://pchart4mw.googlecode.com/files/pchart4mw-bar-01.png
